participant_1.background:
I stay away from clowns and eat my favorite blue jello.
I enjoy racing go karts and driving my classic car.
My pets are always there to listen to me when I need to vent my feelings.
I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation.
i enjoy cooking and baking.

participant_2.background:
I always bump into things because I'm always thinking about my favorite super hero.
I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game.
my favorite artist is bob ross.
My family loves spending time outdoors with our dog.
i m a disappointment to my family.

content.text: I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation.
Congrats on that! I'm hoping to get married soon too.
That's awesome, congrats to you too! What's your favorite thing to do as a couple?
We love going for walks in the park with our dog, he's our favorite pet.
That's so great, I love dogs! Mine is always there to listen to me vent about my day.
Mine too, we're so lucky to have them. What's your favorite type of food to cook?
I love to bake, especially blue jello.
That's so interesting, I've never had blue jello before. I'm more of a sports nutrition kind of guy, so I'm always looking for new recipes to help my son improve his game.
Oh that's cool, I've never met a sports nutritionist before.
There's not many of us out there, but we're all passionate about helping people reach their fitness goals.
That's really great, I'm sure you're making a difference in a lot of people's lives.
I hope so, it's really rewarding work.
